room_title: Escape room "Mission: Homeland" by Riddle in Mashpee
review: We had SO much fun in the Mission Control Room! Lots of creative thoughts and really trying to work together. Plenty of laughs and cheering as well! Thanks for a wonderful time! We will be back again!

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Homeland" by Riddle in Mashpee
review: The Game Master was awesome, the room was extremely challenging, the clues were creative and quirky, and our team ("The 89%" because we weren't part of the 11% who escape) can't wait to tackle this again. Terrific activity for groups of all sizes.

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Homeland" by Riddle in Mashpee
review: Our office staff had a great afternoon of team building at Riddle. We opted to do the most difficult room - Mission Homeland. It was a difficult puzzle to solve, but we had a lot of fun doing it. And we made it out with just over a minute to spare! Appreciated the military discount!
